radiographic_examinations.findings: Diffuse, mild small-bowel dilatation without a transition point, large bowel not dilated, suggestive of an ileus; extraluminal lucency in the right upper quadrant suggestive of free air.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: A second abdominal radiograph obtained 2 days later shows similar findings.

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: Computed tomographic (CT) scan of the abdomen
radiographic_examinations.findings: Prominent small bowel filled with gas and fluid, without a focal obstructing lesion, large bowel not dilated, no free air.
